sub_title: Program Manager | Advocacy & Campaigns | Human Rights Law | I manage successful projects for positive change
summary:
Welcome to my profile! 👋

I am Program Manager and a human rights advocate originally from Brazil, currently based in the Netherlands.

My journey is all about driving transformative change and pursuing justice while collaborating with diverse networks. Over the years, I've gathered rich experience working for NGOs and social enterprises, where I've had the opportunity to coordinate impactful programs, conduct research, craft advocacy strategies, and launch compelling campaigns.

On the academic front, I hold a master's degree in Public International Law from Utrecht University. I've also been expanding my horizons by diving into the world of Digital Marketing, since I've been interested in expanding my knowledge of communication strategies.

My curiosity for cultures and people, coupled with my passion for communication, has driven me to become fluent in Portuguese, Spanish, and English - and to continuously make an effort to learn Dutch. This unique blend of languages and multicultural experiences equips me to assist projects effectively in connecting with their target audience and expanding their network globally.

If you're are looking for a dynamic addition to your Programs, Human Rights, or Campaign team, feel free to reach out to discuss collaborations and my availability. 

Looking forward to connecting and exploring new opportunities! 🌎

authors.headline: Program Manager | Advocacy & Campaigns | Human Rights Law | I manage successful projects for positive change

profile_positions.description:
As a Program Manager, I am responsible for planning, implementing, and monitoring leadership programs that cater to both B2C and B2B audiences. 

• Lead the successful implementation of several leadership programs, reaching over 500 participants from diverse backgrounds so far. 
• Conduct program evaluations, collect feedback from participants, and synthesize learnings to inform future program design and development.
• Develop and implement comprehensive project plans, monitor progress and key milestones, and ensure timely delivery of reports and other project deliverables.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including stakeholders from different time zones, to coordinate project activities, ensure timely delivery of project milestones, and foster strong partnerships.
• Ensure seamless program operations by supporting the planning and monitoring of schedules, budgets, reports, briefings, materials, and deadlines.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the Latin American team, I was dedicated to promoting human rights and social justice in the region. My worked involved conducting research, co-creating impactful campaigns, and raising awareness of human rights violations.

•  Developed and co-created digital campaign content, including conducting interviews for story gathering, writing blog and social media posts, and drafting video scripts.
• Established a strong network of activists in Latin America and Europe and created strong partnerships to share learnings.
• Managed advocacy and campaign strategies, organizing webinars, petitions, and informative content on policy to raise awareness and promote government accountability.
•  Coordinated and facilitated the webinar for the "SOS Colombia" campaign to raise awareness of police violence in the country.
•  Drafted reports analyzing legal and policy implications to provide evidence-based recommendations for advocacy against marginalized groups
•  Conducted analysis of current events and policy developments to identify opportunities for advocacy, project, and funding.
profile_positions.title: Research Trainee

company.name: Instituto De Desenvolvimento E Direitos Humanos -Iddh

profile_positions.company: Instituto De Desenvolvimento E Direitos Humanos -Iddh
profile_positions.description:
I provided support to the Advocacy and Foreign Affairs team, where I collaborated on a variety of initiatives to promote human rights and social justice. Specifically, I focused on developing advocacy strategies to increase the participation of national human rights defenders in UN and Inter-American mechanisms. Additionally, I worked to safeguard the sexual and reproductive health and rights (SRHR) of marginalized women, including those impacted by the Zika virus and women in prison.

•  Supported the creation of an activist network, virtual platform, and training at the United Nations office in Brasília as part of the Coletivo RPU campaign involving over +30 organizations. 
•  Assisted in the implementation of comprehensive training programs for activists and human rights defenders focused on the UN and the Inter-American System.
•  Supported the organization in creating compelling campaign social media content that promoted feminist values and a learning culture around human rights.
•  Developed comprehensive training and advocacy strategies on SRHR for incarcerated women in Brazil, resulting in improved access to information and services for marginalized populations.
•  Conducted extensive legal and policy research to support the amicus curie on the right to abortion for women infected by Zika virus before the Brazilian Supreme Court.
profile_positions.title: Advocacy Assistant - Advocacy and Foreign Affairs Program (Pro Bono)

company.name: Instituto de Desenvolvimento e Direitos Humanos (IDDH)

profile_positions.company: Instituto De Desenvolvimento E Direitos Humanos -Iddh
profile_positions.description:
• Conducted comprehensive desk research on human rights issues to identify key advocacy and campaigns opportunities
• Provided vital administrative support to the organization, managing logistics for advocacy events and ensuring smooth operations
• Produced well-researched, timely, and informative updates and briefing notes on human rights mechanisms to inform decision-making and strategy development.
• Fostered connections with partners, stakeholders, and communities to cultivate equal and collaborative partnerships
•  Provided expert advice and contributed to the development of a public policy plan for children and adolescents in the City of Joinville, which aimed to address social inequality and improve the lives of marginalized populations.
profile_positions.title: Program Assistant - Human Rights Education and Training (Pro Bono)

• Drafted compelling legal documents and judicial decisions, which demonstrated expertise and attention to detail and contributed to favorable case rulings.
• Assisted with important administrative tasks in the office, which resulted in a smooth and efficient workflow.
